title: Gorgoroth - The Last Tormentor
description:
Gorgoroth                             
                          The Last Tormentor

The Last Tormentor is the first EP by Norwegian black metal band Gorgoroth. It was recorded live at Garage in Bergen, Norway on May 23, 1996 and released in the same year. It was re-released[1] on Infernus&#039; record label Forces of Satan Records in November 2007 with the new name Live in Bergen 1996 and on the CD format instead of on a 7".

Track listing

1. Revelation Of Doom ? 4:28

2. Ritual ? 4:33

Released........1996
Recorded........May 23, 1996
Genre...........Black metal
Length..........6:34
Label...........Malicious Records
